title: I Know Good Development Means Good Business

cardDescriptions.Frontend: I am a Frontend-Developer, and I love to create web apps, especially with React, and I also love to create beautiful user interfaces.
cardDescriptions.Backend: I am a Backend-developer and I love building good APIs using the latest technology.
cardDescriptions.WebDesign: I'm an aspiring Web-Designer and I'm passionate about learning more about web design and becoming a pro at it.
